description:
Angelina is the daughter of http://anidb.net/ch105135 [Lucille] and one of the first http://anidb.net/t7208 [Shirogane] who held the http://anidb.net/t4762 [Soft Stone] within her body. She married Saiga Shouji and gave birth to their daughter http://anidb.net/ch97027 [Éléonore] to whom she transferred the Soft Stone.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Angelina
